Combat_GnomeGoblin1_000.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_GnomeGoblin1. AD triggered when taking a turn, if not alone

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_001.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_GnomeGoblin1. AD triggered when taking a turn

BridgeSign.synopsis: Sign near a stone bridge linking the Druid Grove to the Ruined Village. Establishes where the player is in relation to the city of Baldur's Gate. After reading this, natives of the city may pass comment, noting that they know broadly where they are now.

EmptyMindflayerPod.synopsis: Players encountered an empty pod in forest.
EmptyMindflayerPod.how_to_trigger: Interact with the pod at 122; 16; 376 WLD_Main_A

Combat_GnomeGoblin2.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_GnomeGoblin2. AD triggered when taking a turn (REUSE)

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_002.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_GnomeGoblin1. AD triggered when taking a turn

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_003.how_to_trigger: Fight S_FOR_GnomeGoblin1. AD triggered when taking a turn

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_000_0.speaker: Fezzerk
Combat_GnomeGoblin1_000_0.context: NodeContext: Exclamation during combat, ordering lackeys

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_001_0.speaker: Fezzerk
Combat_GnomeGoblin1_001_0.text: Gonna poke some extra holes in you!

BridgeSign_0.speaker: Player
BridgeSign_0.context: NodeContext: Reading a signpost. Elturel pronounced 'ELL-tur-ELL'. Baldur pronounced 'Ball-dur'

EmptyMindflayerPod_0.speaker: Narrator
EmptyMindflayerPod_0.text: *An empty mind flayer vessel. If its occupant survived, they're nowhere to be seen.*

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_002_0.speaker: Fezzerk
Combat_GnomeGoblin1_002_0.text: The Absolute's got my back - I ain't afraid of nothin'!

Combat_GnomeGoblin1_003_0.speaker: Fezzerk
Combat_GnomeGoblin1_003_0.text: The worms'll feast on your sorry carcass when I'm done with you!
